criticalIssues.title: LandingPage.jsx exceeds 1000 lines (1192 LOC)
criticalIssues.issue: Single component contains entire landing page with multiple sub-components. Violates single responsibility principle.
criticalIssues.recommendation: Split into separate components: Navigation, Hero, Benefits, PricingComparison, Process, Trust, Testimonials, MiniFAQ, CTASection, Footer, StickyCTA, ScrollToTop
criticalIssues.impact: High maintainability issues, difficult to test, poor code reusability

criticalIssues.title: Multiple components exceed 400 LOC threshold
criticalIssues.issue: 12 components exceed 400 LOC, indicating poor separation of concerns
criticalIssues.recommendation: Refactor into smaller, focused components. Extract business logic to custom hooks. Move complex UI sections to separate components.
criticalIssues.impact: Reduced maintainability, testing complexity, performance concerns

criticalIssues.title: Hardcoded API base URL in 40+ files
criticalIssues.files: 40 files contain 'http://localhost:3000' or similar hardcoded URLs
criticalIssues.issue: API base URL hardcoded throughout codebase. Difficult to change environments.
criticalIssues.recommendation: Centralize API configuration in src/utils/apiConfig.js or use environment variables consistently

criticalIssues.title: Zero test files found
criticalIssues.issue: No unit or integration tests despite testing libraries being installed (@testing-library/react, vitest)
criticalIssues.recommendation: Implement test suite starting with critical user flows: authentication, checkout, admin operations
criticalIssues.impact: High risk of regressions, difficult to refactor safely

highPriorityIssues.title: ESLint configuration error
highPriorityIssues.issue: ESLint flat config format issue - plugins array should be object
highPriorityIssues.recommendation: Fix ESLint configuration to use flat config format properly
highPriorityIssues.impact: Cannot run linting, potential code quality issues undetected

highPriorityIssues.title: 202 inline style objects found
highPriorityIssues.issue: Extensive use of inline styles instead of Tailwind classes or theme tokens
highPriorityIssues.recommendation: Convert inline styles to Tailwind utility classes or theme tokens for consistency
highPriorityIssues.impact: Theme inconsistency, difficult to maintain design system

highPriorityIssues.title: Hardcoded color values in 24 files
highPriorityIssues.issue: Hex colors, RGB values hardcoded instead of using theme system
highPriorityIssues.recommendation: Replace with theme tokens from themeTokens.js or CSS variables
highPriorityIssues.impact: Theme changes require manual updates across many files

highPriorityIssues.title: 51 console.log/warn/error statements in production code
highPriorityIssues.issue: Console statements should be removed or replaced with proper logging in production
highPriorityIssues.recommendation: Remove or replace with proper logging utility (e.g., winston, pino) with environment-based levels

highPriorityIssues.title: Limited accessibility attributes
highPriorityIssues.files: 26 files have aria-* or role attributes, but coverage is incomplete
highPriorityIssues.issue: Many interactive elements lack proper ARIA labels, roles, or keyboard navigation support
highPriorityIssues.recommendation: Audit all interactive elements for ARIA compliance. Add keyboard navigation support.
highPriorityIssues.impact: Poor accessibility for screen readers and keyboard users

highPriorityIssues.title: 15 TODO/FIXME comments found
highPriorityIssues.issue: Technical debt markers indicating incomplete or problematic code
highPriorityIssues.recommendation: Review and resolve all TODO/FIXME comments or create tickets for tracking

mediumPriorityIssues.title: Large image asset found
mediumPriorityIssues.issue: Large image may impact page load performance
mediumPriorityIssues.recommendation: Optimize image (compress, convert to WebP, lazy load)

mediumPriorityIssues.title: Similar patterns across multiple files
mediumPriorityIssues.issue: Similar form validation, API call patterns, and error handling repeated across components
mediumPriorityIssues.recommendation: Extract common patterns to custom hooks (useFormValidation, useApiCall) and utility functions

mediumPriorityIssues.title: String literals that should be constants
mediumPriorityIssues.issue: Button labels, error messages, success messages hardcoded throughout components
mediumPriorityIssues.recommendation: Centralize UI strings in src/utils/uiStrings.js or i18n system

mediumPriorityIssues.title: Heavy React hooks usage in LandingPage
mediumPriorityIssues.recommendation: Split component to reduce hook complexity, use React.memo for expensive renders
mediumPriorityIssues.impact: Potential performance issues, complex state management

mediumPriorityIssues.title: Potentially unused dependencies
mediumPriorityIssues.issue: These packages are installed but may not be used (requires manual verification)
mediumPriorityIssues.recommendation: Audit package.json dependencies, remove unused packages

lowPriorityIssues.title: Missing component documentation
lowPriorityIssues.issue: Many components lack JSDoc comments or purpose documentation
lowPriorityIssues.recommendation: Add JSDoc comments to all exported components

lowPriorityIssues.title: Inconsistent file naming
lowPriorityIssues.issue: Mix of camelCase (dashboard.jsx) and PascalCase (UserLogin.jsx) in pages directory
lowPriorityIssues.recommendation: Standardize to PascalCase for component files

lowPriorityIssues.title: Responsive utilities exist but usage inconsistent
lowPriorityIssues.issue: Responsive utilities defined but not consistently used across components
lowPriorityIssues.recommendation: Audit responsive design implementation, ensure mobile-first approach
